name: Config 2022 Name Badge - Jakub Kameniar
description:
I have been doing UX/UI for over 5 years and Figma fascinated me ❤️


I'm very excited about the news presented at config 2022 and I'm already looking forward to gradually involving them in the projects (even if I have no choice but to do it during my free time at nights 😂)

I really liked the lectures. So much information and inspiration started my creativity at 150%.


Looking foward to next Config 🥳


P.S.: Dark mode is the best and autolayout forever, even I am little bit confused right now with new arrangement of the panel, I will get used to it quickly 😁 New management of variants is lifesaver!
